channel.title: Experiences on Pepper's Serendipity
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Pepper's Serendipity

item.title: In the middle of my summer intern in France
item.description: This is my first post on the website Preface I’ve been constructing this website for about two weeks. This post should have been written long time ago. Finally, I got the time to write something about me. I am studying in Télécom ParisTech and it will still take me 1 year. After leaving Paris, I will come back to Shanghai Jiaotong University for another 1 year and a half and obtain my Master Degree.
